param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Description tooltip used in item editor

param.name: display
param.label: Display
param.description: Display element only on selected view

param.name: effect
param.label: Slideshow Transition
param.description: Set the image transition effect (only for slideshow style)

param.name: spotlight
param.label: Thumbnail Spotlight
param.description: Thumbnail opacity will change on mouse hover

param.name: width
param.label: Thumbnail Width (px)
param.description: Default thumbnail width in pixel (set to 0 to auto-calculate width)

param.name: height
param.label: Thumbnail Height (px)
param.description: Default thumbnail height in pixel (set to 0 to auto-calculate height)

param.name: resize
param.label: Thumbnail Resizing
param.description: If set the source image width/height are resized to match the thumbnail width/height

param.name: count
param.label: Thumbnail Count
param.description: Limit the number of thumbnails to show, set it to 0 to show all thumbnails

param.name: thumb_cache_dir
param.label: Thumbnail Cache Directory
param.description: Default thumbnail cache directory name which resides inside the source images directory

param.name: thumb_cache_time
param.label: Thumbnail Cache Time (min)
param.description: Period of time (minutes) until the thumbnail image is re-cached

param.name: rel
param.label: Lightbox Rel Parameter
param.description: If set the custom rel parameter is used for the lightbox, Example lightbox[mygallery]
